pkgmetadata.longdescription: Automating the Fitting of Double Linear Mixed Models in 'JAGS' and 'nimble' // Automates fitting of double GLM in 'JAGS'. Includes automatic generation of 'JAGS' scripts, running 'JAGS' or 'nimble' via the 'rjags' and 'nimble' package, and summarizing the resulting output.
